OrgName.entry: FRIENDS OF THE CHOLERA MONUMENT GROUNDS AND CLAYWOOD

Desc.entry: A voluntary group that works to maintain and improve the Cholera Monument grounds and the adjacent Clay Woods. Organises litter picking days, works with the park rangers service and seeks to raise funds to help support and maintain the park grounds and equipment. Previous fundraising projects have helped to build new wheelchair and pushchair friendly paths through the grounds and woods and paid for 10 new benches to be installed in the park. Also organises an annual park funday in August.
